Package game.behaviour

Class BreedBehaviour

java.lang.Object
game.behaviour.BreedBehaviour
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behaviour
Direct Known Subclasses:
FlyingBreedBehaviour, LandBreedBehaviour
public abstract class BreedBehaviour
extends java.lang.Object
implements Behaviour
Class that decides whether an actor is ready to breed and find a breed partner
Since:
20/05/2021
Author:
Lin Chen Xiang
See Also:
LandBreedBehaviour, FlyingBreedBehaviour, BreedAction

  • Constructor Details

    • BreedBehaviour

      public BreedBehaviour()

  • Method Details

    • passConditions

      boolean passConditions​(Dinosaur dinosaur)
      Checks common conditions whether Dinosaur is eligible for breeding or not
      Parameters:
      dinosaur - the dinosaur to check if pass all conditions to breed
      Returns:
      true if pass all conditions, false otherwise

    • findPartnerInRadius

      public Action findPartnerInRadius​(Location here, int radius, Dinosaur dinosaur, Gender targetGender, GameMap map)
      Find a suitable partner in set radius, return action if found
      Parameters:
      here - Location of actor looking for breeding partner
      radius - the radius of the actor to determine bound of actor surroundings
      dinosaur - the dinosaur searching for partner
      map - World map
      Returns:
      null if no partner found in radius, follow if found partner (moveactoraction)

    • hasPartner

      abstract Action hasPartner​(Location there, Dinosaur dinosaur, Gender targetGender, GameMap map)
      Check if this tile has a suitable partner
      Parameters:
      there - Location of this tile
      dinosaur - the Dinosaur finding a partner
      map - World map
      Returns:
      null if no suitable partner, follow.getAction if found partner

    • breedChance

      double breedChance()
      Dinosaur has a 70% chance of wanting to breed
      Returns:
      0.7 which is the chance of wanting to breed

    • wantsToBreed

      boolean wantsToBreed()
      See whether Dinosaur feels like breeding
      Returns:
      true if Dinosaur wants to breed, false otherwise
